meanings.definition: A person who worships a deity or religious figure.
meanings.sent1: The worshipper prayed at the temple every morning.
meanings.sent2: The devoted worshipper knelt before the altar in reverence.
meanings.sent3: The worshipper accidentally dropped their prayer book during the ceremony.
meanings.sent4: She was a loyal worshipper of the ancient traditions.
meanings.sent5: The worshipper's face lit up with joy as they sang hymns.

meanings.definition: One who shows reverence and adoration towards something or someone.
meanings.sent1: The little girl was a worshipper of fairy tales, believing in magic.
meanings.sent2: As a nature worshipper, he spent hours admiring the beauty of the forest.
meanings.sent3: The worshipper of chocolate couldn't resist indulging in a sweet treat.
meanings.sent4: She was a worshipper of the stars, finding peace in their twinkling light.
meanings.sent5: The artist was a worshipper of creativity, always seeking new inspiration.
